text: SriLankan Airlines wishes to notify the general public that there is a fake airline survey currently circulating on the internet and social media including messenger apps, mentioning SriLankan Airlines offering free tickets. This is NOT a SriLankan Airlines promotion.This is a malicious and false site that is attempting to prey on our valued customers. Please do NOT access any sites that are not directly linked to SriLankan Airlines web page. The airline is currently offering a Partner flies free promotional offer that can only be accessed via www.srilankan.com.SriLankan Airlines will not undertake any responsibility with regard to promotional campaigns not carried out directly by the airline.
